Class Fox

java.lang.Object
Animal
Fox
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actor
public class Fox
extends Animal
A simple model of a fox. Foxes age, move, eat rabbits, and die.

  • Constructor Details

    • Fox

      public Fox​(boolean randomAge, Field field, Location location)
      Create a fox. A fox can be created as a new born (age zero and not hungry) or with random age.
      Parameters:
      randomAge - If true, the fox will have random age and hunger level.
      field - I defined a field position
      location - I set the initial location
